name: Penguin #1
description:
Mr Penguin is trying to get home, help him find his way by moving the ice blocks to give a clear ice path home.
Slide the ice blocks left and right to move into the correct position to help Mr Penguin on his journey home. Be careful with positioning of the blocks as well as the timing.

You can do it!

Feedback: contact@motigames.com
More information: www.motigames.com
